title: Make site fully functional, add contact/WhatsApp number, and include new service

requirements.text: Update the centralized site configuration to use the provided contact/WhatsApp number (+91 9182768591), including: (1) WhatsApp display number, (2) WhatsApp wa.me link using 919182768591, and (3) a click-to-call tel: link targetable by UI components.

quotes: make it completely functional & add this number for contact & whatsapp number(+91 9182768591)

acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/config/site.ts contains the WhatsApp number as "+91 9182768591" (or equivalent formatting) and the WhatsApp link uses https://wa.me/919182768591 with a prefilled message query string
A phone contact value exists in site configuration that can be used to render a tel: link (e.g., tel:+919182768591)

requirements.text: Add the provided phone number (+91 9182768591) as a visible click-to-call contact option across the site where contact methods are listed (at minimum: Footer and Contact page), and ensure WhatsApp CTAs use the updated WhatsApp link from site configuration.

quotes: add this number for contact & whatsapp number(+91 9182768591)

acceptanceCriteria: Footer shows a phone entry that links to tel:+919182768591 and is keyboard accessible
Contact page 'Other Ways to Reach Us' includes the phone number as a tel: link in addition to email and WhatsApp
WhatsApp button and any WhatsApp links on the site open the updated wa.me link in a new tab

requirements.text: Include the service named "Complete Business Automation System" in the Services page services list with the same structure as other services (title, whatItIs, whyItMatters, businessImpact) and conversion-focused English copy.

quotes: Complete Business Automation System- include this service

acceptanceCriteria: Services page renders an additional ServiceCard titled "Complete Business Automation System"
The new service includes non-empty 'what it is', 'why it matters', and 'business impact' text consistent with the existing tone and format

requirements.text: Ensure the website is fully functional end-to-end: all navigation links and primary CTAs route correctly, the contact form submits successfully to the backend for unauthenticated visitors, and the UI provides clear success/error feedback without requiring Internet Identity login.
acceptanceCriteria: Header navigation links route correctly to Home, Services, About, Pricing, and Contact on both desktop and mobile menus
All primary CTA buttons that point to internal pages (e.g., "/contact", "/pricing") navigate without errors
Contact form submission works for logged-out/guest users and displays the existing success state on success and error state on failure
Backend stores submitted contact form entries via submitContactForm without authorization requirements (no regression to backend/main.mo public contact form behavior)

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only UI components).
Do not edit immutable hook files: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; add backend/migration.mo only if an upgrade requires state migration.
nonGoals: Do not implement actual WhatsApp Business automation, auto-reply, or smart routing features; only update contact/linking on the website.
Do not add third-party authentication providers; only Internet Identity is allowed.
Do not add external databases or external backend services.
